translated: Having broken the arrow with my hands,
and made a nest of the pieces,
By that I came to be known as Sarabhaṅga,
Today it is not proper for me
to break an arrow with my hands;
The training rules have been laid down
by doing what the god said.
By the very path Vipassī went,

analyzed: yena iva maggena sikhī ca vessabhū
translated: by the very path Sikhī and Vessabhū;
Gotama went by that very path.
seven Buddhas, destroyers of the round;
The Dhamma that has been taught by them,
by those who are Dhamma, who are calm.
out of compassion for living beings;
in the endless cycle of existence;
At the breaking up of the body,
There is no more of this or that state of existence,
I am well-released from all bonds.”
The Seven Group is finished.🔽Here is the summary:
the seven groups of five elders,🔽fifty-three verses.
